item.title: YMM
item.description: score:316 Chances: Full Truck Alliance Co., Ltd. operates as a holding company providing comprehensive services for shippers and truckers through its mobile and website platforms. The company’s platform connects shippers with truckers to facilitate shipments across different distance ranges, cargo weights, and types.
